txt.en: Leighton Howard has asked you to obtain some weapons of bronze with which he can defend his family.

'These are dangerous times. Those Blackwold villains are roving through the Chetwood, nearly unchecked! Yes, they suffered a defeat at Archet, but you could just as well call that a defeat for the people who live there! It'll be a long time before the town is rebuilt!

'I need to defend my family from those brigands, and I don't think the constables are up to the task. They mean well, but I trust the strength of my arms more than any well-meaning constable.

'Trouble is, the smiths are tasked with too many duties and their prices are far too high! If you have any connexions, or a weaponsmith that holds you in friendship, I'd pay you reasonable rates for a bronze axe and two bronze blades, and throw in a few sundries as well. The axe will serve me until I can replace the blades of my own sword and my son's with whatever you can bring me. Hurry now! The Chetwood is full of those villainous Blackwolds!'

Leighton Howard is in the town of Combe, in Bree-land.\n\nLeighton has asked you to obtain a bronze axe and two bronze blades for him, because the local weaponsmiths are charging too much for him to pay, and he needs them to protect his family.

'You've got a good heart, [placeholder], and I know my whole family thanks you: my wife Kate, my son Nate, and my daughters Piper and Pepper.\n\n'I give you these coins and a few odds and ends for your trouble, and I will get to replacing the blades of my old weapons with these new ones you have brought to me.'

Leighton Howard is in the town of Combe, in Bree-land.\n\nLeighton has asked you to obtain a bronze axe and two bronze blades for him, because the local weaponsmiths are charging too much for him to pay, and he needs them to protect his family.
'You have my thanks, and also those of Kate, Nate, Piper, and Pepper, I am sure!'
'I need a bronze axe and two bronze blades, [placeholder], if I am to defend my family from the brigands of the Chetwood!'
'Weaponsmiths around here have been making a fortune. Everyone needs weapons!'
'Weaponsmiths around here have been making a fortune. Everyone needs weapons!'
Bring a bronze axe and two bronze blades to Leighton Howard
